subject: Basketball
Deaths (Fatalities)
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Wes Leonard made the winning layup in overtime Thursday night to secure a 20-0 regular season for Fennville High in Michigan. Shortly after, he collapsed and later died.
snippet: Wes Leonard made the winning layup in overtime Thursday night to secure a 20-0 regular season for Fennville High in Michigan. Shortly after, he collapsed and later died.
